attributes.action: Get SIA to recognise higher First aid certificates as part of the license
attributes.additional_details: i want this to be changed and have emergency first aid at work be the minimum requirement and if you have a higher certificate in first aid for it to be Recognised as it seems to be just getting more expensive to have your license to be making pennies
attributes.background: Sia are saying if u have done a 4 day course such as first responder it will not be recognised and u still need to do the one day course for Emergency first aid at work

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is an operational decision for the SIA and not a decision for the UK Government or Parliament.
